articles.author: Kate Kelland
articles.title: Single-patient study adds to debate over Gilead's remdesivir for COVID-19 - Reuters
articles.description: A single-patient study conducted by British scientists has found that Gilead's antiviral drug remdesivir could be highly effective against COVID-19, raising questions about previous studies that found it had no impact on death rates from the disease.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - A single-patient study conducted by British scientists has found that Gileads antiviral drug remdesivir could be highly effective against COVID-19, raising questions about previous… [+2876 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine administered to first 5 frontline UPMC workers - WPXI Pittsburgh
articles.description: The first five UPMC employees were administered Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine, after the vaccines arrived in the area Monday.
articles.content:
PITTSBURGH — Five UPMC employees were the first in the state to be administered Pfizers COVID-19 vaccine, after the vaccines arrived in the area Monday.
UPMC received 975 doses of the vaccine Monday… [+4024 chars]
